property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oaths are naught but empty air. Take what measures you must to ensure absolute loyalty." - The Witch's Way

property.name: Artist
property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She was the rising sun, her courage banishing the terrors of the night." - Legend of the Gilded Knights

property.name: Artist
property.value: Maël OLLIVIER-HENRY

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Grasp of Fate enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until Grasp of Fate leaves the battlefield. (Those permanents return under their owners' control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The witch wrapped her heart in briar vines, hid it away in the ancient keep in the depths of the forest. If none could find it, the prophecy could never come to pass." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Artist
property.value: WFlemming Illustration

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hunter drew her dagger and found she grasped a flower. She reached for an arrow, but her quiver held only leaves." - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Artist
property.value: Meel Tamphanon

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Davin's heart swelled with a heady mix of excitement and fear. If the young griffin accepted him, he would begin his path to knighthood." - Skies of Ardenvale

property.name: Artist
property.value: Eva Eskelinen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Find glory not in blood, nor dragons felled, But in kindness given, oaths upheld." - "The Scholar + the Knight"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have wronged your family on a fool's errand. All I can offer is myself, that you might take your revenge." - The Folly of Syr Perrin

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Marjoram

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Bassini

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘That town is rudely blocking my view!' said the witch. The giant bowed and smiled." - The Goose Mother and Other Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An enchanted glade revealed itself, offering safety in its warm embrace. Still she walked on." - The Nameless Knight of Summer

property.name: Artist
property.value: WFlemming Illustration

property.name: Rules
property.value: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the realm's great minds quarreled over the strange eclipse, Locthwain fell to the invaders." - Last Stand of the Realm

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The king ordered those lost in sleep be placed in glass caskets, protected and watched in case they might one day wake." - The Wicked Slumber

property.name: Artist
property.value: Serena Malyon

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They laughed with glee as the pixie spun gold from straw. They smiled and shrugged when their curtains and clothes were next on the wheel. Then he grabbed their hair." - The Goose Mother and Other Tales

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Aeron Ng

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card. {1}{U}, Sacrifice Compulsion: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O my love, would that you could understand! Adventure beckons; I must take its hand." - "The Scholar + the Knight"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Aeron Ng

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘I don't need anyone else,' muttered Hylda. ‘You don't need anyone else,' her reflection agreed." - Witch of Winter

property.name: Artist
property.value: Abigail Larson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Valtry gasped. The strange new coral was not coral at all, but a fallen drywalker! But how did it get to the bottom of Loch Larent?" - The Merfolk Who Walked

property.name: Artist
property.value: Abigail Larson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘My kingdom for a feast!' quoth the king. A faerie appeared before him, and spoke through a wicked grin: ‘As you wish.'" - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Aura Curse

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I saw my mind stretch like cloth on a loom, Warping, twisting toward a deathless doom." - A Traveler's Trials

property.name: Artist
property.value: Meel Tamphanon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hatching Plans is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The thief fled with her ill-gotten prize, her mind awhirl with visions of wealth and glory. In her pack, unnoticed, the egg began to stir and crack." - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Marjoram

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dark forest lit up with a thousand eyes, and for the first time, Jurald considered that the High Fae might be more than myth." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The towers were like a song on the night breeze, faint and lovely, calling her home." - A Quickling's Journey

property.name: Artist
property.value: Serena Malyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You may cast spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A glowing spring appeared before her, promising untold wisdom. Still she walked on." - The Nameless Knight of Summer

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Bassini

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are led by Talion, the Kindly Lord, First and Greatest of the High Fae, Sovereign of the Court, the Liege of Laughter, Finder of the First Yew, and the One True Lord of Eldraine." - On the High Fae

property.name: Artist
property.value: Justin + Alexis Hernandez

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Despite her father's warnings, Valtry's fascination with the surface only grew. She collected things that fell to the bottom, daydreaming of life on land." - The Merfolk Who Walked

property.name: Artist
property.value: Serena Malyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hasty efforts to defend Castle Vantress left it more moat than castle." - Last Stand of the Realm

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lander Strijbol

property.name: Type
property.value: Tribal Enchantment

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tarry not in Tuinvale, Ignore the flowers' heady scents. Take no thing, stay to the trail, Lest the fae seek recompense." - To Walk the Wilds

property.name: Artist
property.value: Serena Malyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ours is a path of the outcast, of pain given and pain received. But for the strong, it is a path that leads to power untethered from fae riddles." - The Witch's Way

property.name: Artist
property.value: Abigail Larson

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Fools,' sneered the witch. ‘I never intended to leave here alive. And thanks to your dogged insistence on following me, neither will you.'" - Hexes of Dunbarrow

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zach Alexander

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Malevolent lights pulsed around her, whispering of riches in the dark. Still she walked on." - The Nameless Knight of Summer

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Marjoram

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Abigail Larson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘The human world will fall,' whispered the monstrous rat. ‘You have but one choice to make: Will you fall with it?'" - Song of the Vermin

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Bassini

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Get out! Get out!' the dead screamed. ‘We've not room for one more! Get out!'" - Hexes of Dunbarrow

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Twas the cruelest of ironies: the realm, in desperate need of rest, gripped by endless sleep that offered no comfort." - The Wicked Slumber

property.name: Artist
property.value: William Phifer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The witch smiled, savoring every stolen year. Every love the knight would never court, every meal he'd never taste, every honor he'd never win, was sweet as honey on her tongue." - Hexes of Dunbarrow

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What first seemed like a ridiculous and vaguely demeaning task quickly turned into a vicious struggle for survival." - Welcome to Sweettooth

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should prying eyes observe the ritual, seize them for the cauldron, and soak the altar with the blood of the witness." - The Witch's Way

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}. Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Benjamin Ee

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The knights of Embereth fought with the fire of the Irencrag in their hearts. Though many fell, not a single one retreated." - Last Stand of the Realm

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wyrm's dread eye upon the land was turned, And all its people bent the knee - or burned." - "The Night of Dragonfire"

property.name: Artist
property.value: William Phifer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With reckless courage, Cade embraced the flame. He vowed they wouldn't dare forget his name." - "The Night of Dragonfire"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mighty Torbran struck the invading phalanx like a bolt from the heavens. When the light faded, only ash remained around him." - Last Stand of the Realm

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What redcaps lack in strategic acumen they more than make up for with brazen audacity." - The Kenriths' Royal Bestiary

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With tears in his smoke-scorched eyes, he watched the living flames consume the only home he'd ever known." - The Apprentice's Folly

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Marjoram

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Sam Chivers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give my heart to the mountain, my memories to the wind. Let my last moment be burned into history." - Daughters of Flame

property.name: Artist
property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For slaying dozens of redcaps using only fruit and cakes, the dwarven survivors were dubbed the Gluttoneers." - Assault on Delverhaugh

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tugrunn threw blow after blow, howling with pain as his fist met solid rock. The creature merely stared quizzically at him, unsure when the fight would start." - The Goose Mother and Other Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The feud between dwarves and redcaps had raged for so long that no one could quite recall how it started. Few would believe it was sparked by a long-ago dispute over a spoon." - Assault on Delverhaugh

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lander Strijbol

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Korlag carefully prepared to try the new ‘am bush' strategy he'd heard about." - The Ogre's Revenge

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shafer Brown

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And as the rose began to bloom, the curse of Redtooth Keep began, at last, to wither." - Curse of the Werefox

property.name: Artist
property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Eva Eskelinen

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.) Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harry Conway

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They laid her to rest in the wilds, in a sacred place beyond the reach of nightmares or machines." - The Nameless Knight of Summer

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before me writhed the guardian of my prize, A serpent with stone skin and cunning eyes!" - A Traveler's Trials

property.name: Artist
property.value: Abigail Larson

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Abundance is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you tap a creature for mana, add an additional {G}. {6}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The troll took the fauns' hesitation as fear and roared in triumph. In truth, they'd seen the ledge begin to crack beneath his weight." - The Goose Mother and Other Tales

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matteo Bassini

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brave Syr Armont mused: Was the elves' true nature that of day's civility or night's savagery? Could such bestial rage be bestowed by curse alone?" - Curse of the Werefox

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lander Strijbol

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead. If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Maël OLLIVIER-HENRY

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There would be time later to mourn the lost, to weep for their fallen homes and lost treasures. But for now, they breathed in the untainted air and allowed themselves to hope again." - Last Stand of the Realm

property.name: Artist
property.value: Qianjiao Ma

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Maël OLLIVIER-HENRY

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should you hear witchstalkers howl, Best to hide or run away. They hunt witches vile and foul. Fear both predator and prey." - To Walk the Wilds

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Forest As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

property.name: Artist
property.value: 獣道/KEMONOMICHI

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
